languages.text: "Идира!" {n}Абеляр недовольно отряхивается и перехватывает оружие.{/n} "Неужели хотя бы сейчас нельзя было формулировать свои предсказания четче? Мы едва не погибли!"

traits.locale_text: "Идира!" {n}Абеляр недовольно отряхивается и перехватывает оружие.{/n} "Неужели хотя бы сейчас нельзя было формулировать свои предсказания четче? Мы едва не погибли!"

languages.text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"
languages.original_text: "Идира!" {n}Абеляр недовольно отряхивается и перехватывает оружие.{/n} "Неужели хотя бы сейчас нельзя было формулировать свои предсказания четче? Мы едва не погибли!"

traits.locale_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"
"Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

"Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"
"Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

languages.text: “伊迪拉！”{n}阿贝拉德一边抱怨着，一边掸着身上的灰尘，再次握紧了武器。{/n}“你就不能把你的话说清楚点吗？刚刚真是太危险了！”
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

traits.locale_text: “伊迪拉！”{n}阿贝拉德一边抱怨着，一边掸着身上的灰尘，再次握紧了武器。{/n}“你就不能把你的话说清楚点吗？刚刚真是太危险了！”

languages.text: «¡Idira!». {n}Abelard farfulla mientras se limpia el polvo y vuelve a empuñar su arma.{/n} «¿Sería demasiado pedir que explicara sus visiones de forma que las entendamos por una vez? ¡Eso ha estado muy cerca!».
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Idira!». {n}Abelard farfulla mientras se limpia el polvo y vuelve a empuñar su arma.{/n} «¿Sería demasiado pedir que explicara sus visiones de forma que las entendamos por una vez? ¡Eso ha estado muy cerca!».

languages.text: 「イディラ！」{n}アベラルドは体から埃を払い、再び武器を握りながら不満を口にする。{/n}「一度くらい予言をわかりやすく言って欲しいというのは望みすぎか？危ないじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ！」{n}アベラルドは体から埃を払い、再び武器を握りながら不満を口にする。{/n}「一度だけでも予言をわかりやすく言って欲しいというのは望みすぎか？あれは危なかった！」
「イディラ！」{n}アベラルドは体から埃を払い、再び武器を握りながら不満を口にする。{/n}「一度くらい予言をわかりやすく言って欲しいというのは望みすぎか？危ないじゃないか！」

languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

languages.text: « Idira ! » {n}Abélard grommelle en époussetant ses vêtements, puis il reprend son arme en main.{/n} « Ce serait trop vous demander de bien vouloir énoncer clairement vos prédictions, pour une fois ? C'est passé beaucoup trop près ! »
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

traits.locale_text: « Idira ! » {n}Abélard grommelle en époussetant ses vêtements, puis il reprend son arme en main.{/n} « Ce serait trop vous demander de bien vouloir énoncer clairement vos prédictions, pour une fois ? C'est passé beaucoup trop près ! »

languages.text: "Idira!", {n}grummelt Abelard, als er sich vom Staub befreit und wieder zu seiner Waffe greift.{/n} "Wäre es zu viel verlangt, dass Ihr Eure Vorhersagen ein einziges Mal klar und deutlich formuliert? Das war zu knapp!"
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"

traits.locale_text: "Idira!", {n}grummelt Abelard, als er sich vom Staub befreit und wieder zu seiner Waffe greift.{/n} "Wäre es zu viel verlangt, dass Ihr Eure Vorhersagen ein einziges Mal klar und deutlich formuliert? Das was zu knapp!"

languages.text: "İdira!" {n}Abelard, üstündeki tozu silkeleyip silahını tekrar eline alırken homurdanıyor.{/n} "Şu kehanetlerini bir kerecik de olsa açık seçik dile getirsen ölür müsün? Çok ucuz atlattık!"
languages.original_text: "Idira!" {n}Abelard grumbles as he dusts himself off and grips his weapon again.{/n} "Would it be too much to ask that you phrase your soothsayings plainly for once? That was too close!"
